verses.roman:
vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi
vimānāvalibhir nabhaḥ
kurvantaḥ saṅkulaṁ rājan
bhaktyā paramayā yutāḥ

synonyms: vavṛṣuḥ—they showered; puṣpa-varṣāṇi—showers of flowers; vimāna—of airplanes; āvalibhiḥ—by great numbers; nabhaḥ—the sky; kurvantaḥ—making; saṅkulam—filled up; rājan—O King Parīkṣit; bhaktyā—with devotion; paramayā—transcendental; yutāḥ—endowed.
translation: O King, crowding the sky with their many airplanes, they showered down flowers with great devotion.
